name: Wonderweeks Company Inc.
description: Provider of childcare information services intended to offer smart parenting. The company provides deals scanners, trending childcare items, mom blogs, parenting tips from experts as well as shopping for children along with other related information, allowing pregnant women and new parents to access childcare tips and objects.
